metadata.title: USN-6168-1 -- libx11 vulnerability
metadata.description: Gregory James Duck discovered that libx11 incorrectly handled certain Request, Event, or Error IDs. If a user were tricked into connecting to a malicious X Server, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause libx11 to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6168-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libx11-6 - 2:1.6.9-2ubuntu1.5 libx11-data - 2:1.6.9-2ubuntu1.5 libx11-xcb-dev - 2:1.6.9-2ubuntu1.5 libx11-xcb1 - 2:1.6.9-2ubuntu1.5 libx11-doc - 2:1.6.9-2ubuntu1.5 libx11-dev - 2:1.6.9-2ubuntu1.5 No subscription required
